price: ይህች (የተወሳችው) በእርግጥ ያለፈች ሕዝብ ናት፡፡ ለርሷ የሠራችው (ምንዳ) አላት፡፡ ለናንተም የሠራችሁት (ምንዳ) አላችሁ፡፡ ይሠሩትም ከነበሩት አትጠየቁም፡፡
arabic: تِلۡكَ أُمَّةٞ قَدۡ خَلَتۡۖ لَهَا مَا كَسَبَتۡ وَلَكُم مَّا كَسَبۡتُمۡۖ وَلَا تُسۡـَٔلُونَ عَمَّا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: til'ka ummatun qad khalat lahā mā kasabat walakum mā kasabtum walā tus'alūna ʿammā kānū yaʿmalūna
